title: Katarina, but all her blade interactions are cast on allies to heal them
body: Pretty simple, just a combo based healer. Obviously the individual heals on abilities would be much smaller than a Soraka W, or Janna shield. But when combo'd correctly would offer more efficient heals per second to offer a more satisfying player experience. Just a concept from someone who likes Soraka, but also likes outplays. What do you guys think of a champ or rework like this?
